General.Name: La Perla Fashion Holding
General.Description: La Perla Fashion Holding N.V. designs, manufactures, and retails luxury lingerie, underwear, nightwear, and swimwear. It offers its products for women and men. The company markets its products through retail and wholesale channels under the La Perla brand. It operates through boutiques, including own and partner-operated boutiques; department stores with shop-in-shops and concessions; outlet stores; and various digital sales platforms, including laperla.com and other third-party operated platforms. The company was formerly known as Glow Media N.V. and changed its name to La Perla Fashion Holding N.V. in May 2018. La Perla Fashion Holding N.V. was founded in 1954 and is based in Schiphol, the Netherlands.
